entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Fort Liard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 p.m. MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
